com.intersys.globals.graphapi.globalsgraphdb
Class GlGraph

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractSet<E>
          java.util.HashSet<GlGraphNode>
              com.intersys.globals.graphapi.globalsgraphdb.GlGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graph<GlGraphNode>, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<GlGraphNode>, java.util.Collection<GlGraphNode>, java.util.Set<GlGraphNode>
public class GlGraph
extends java.util.HashSet<GlGraphNode>
implements Graph<GlGraphNode>

GlGraph is an implementation of the Graph package that uses the GlobalsDB free database as persistence.

See Also:
